ygData.subject: weapon specialization
ygData.msgSnippet: One question I forgot to ask, but I am getting a lot of email in support of is weapon specialization.  That is allowing a warrior to specialize in one weapon
ygData.messageBody:
One question I forgot to ask, but I am getting a lot of email in support of
is "weapon specialization." That is allowing a warrior to specialize in one
weapon skill (i.e. 1H slashing for my combine longsword!). I have gotten a
lot of responses so far to the survey, as I said I will post the final
responses to the survey next week (probably Monday morning).

Once again to vote, please visit the following web page:

http://www.onelist.com/surveycenter/warriors_eq

Feel free to email me directly at patty_halas@... with any
comments/suggestions. This is a serious issue and although I am having fun
roleplaying a ranger, she is nothing like my blood thirsty fearless
barbarian warrior princess!

For the Honor and Glory of Rallos Zek;

Patty of Halas
username: Patricia
server: Bristlebane

By the way, buy or make arrows, use bows - nothing is more fun than shooting
an Orc in the back when he is trying to flee. "Death to everything!"
